text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: With this, you are now responsible for Suzuka.
Understood. So I don't betray Suzuka's expectations, I'll give her my full support.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I apologize for saying such a selfish thing. For taking care of me until now, I'm very grateful.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: I wanted to chase your dream with you, but now that it's come to this, it can't be helped. It's unfortunate… but it's what you've chosen yourself, Suzuka. You have my respect.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: With such strong feelings, Suzuka, you'll definitely be fine! Make sure you grab hold of your dream in <Sirius>!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Understood…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um… Please treat me well.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uoooooo~! Welcome to the team!! Spe-chan, you've been constantly worried about Suzuka, aren't you glad too?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… well, that's true but, when you say it like that it's kind of embarassing…
Alright, I know it's kind of sudden, but let's start with race observation practice.
I say that, but it's fine if you don't think too hard about it. Just like you did before, just run as you desire.
I say that, but it's fine if you don't think too hard about it. Just like you did before, just run as you desire.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: As I desire… understood.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Fuuu!!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Fuwaah…!? What amazing speed!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And doesn't she keep accelerating?! Straight for the goal like this?!
And with that incredible speed, she stole the show.
Hahahaa… If she makes it to the goal like this, things will become hectic…
Hahahaa… If she makes it to the goal like this, things will become hectic…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… haa… haa…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… Hn…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haaa… haaa… Fuuu~…
Running and running like that, are you okay?
Running and running like that, are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …I-I'm… fine. My pacing is an absolute mess… and my time is horrible… but…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It felt… very good… and was fun…
Even though she was breathing heavily, Silence Suzuka had a satisfied look on her face. How much fun she had was obvious.
Even just watching was fun. Just thinking about what would happen if you ran all the way to the goal like that.
Just like this, let's figure out a running style for Suzuka, together! Alright, how about running one more?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Yes!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I was watching today's training. I don't recall any of the books in the library containing THAT kind of running.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It was terrible, wasn't it? Not even thinking about my pace, just running any way I wanted.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Geez… even though you're aware of just how bad it was, you're still saying it as if you're having fun.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No way, I wasn't really having fun talking about it… Fufuu.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Running while ignoring common sense- even like that, for some reason, it feels like the "scenery" I want to see is becoming clearer.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …even I don't know what to say. Compared to your previous running style, I feel more of a sense of wonder from this absurd new one.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Of course, that doesn't mean I intend to lose to you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'm looking forward to racing against you, Air Groove.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Run! Run! Silence Suzuka! She's making her great escape! Pulling away from the pack as they enter the final straight!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: 200m left! Whoa! "Last Year's Champion" and "Empress Air Groove" has caught Silence Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: This race has become a showdown between these two! A fierce battle! Inside?! Outside?!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Just slightly from the outside, Air Groove crosses the goal first! Air Groove, magnificiently conquers this G1 stage!
On your first race as a member of team <Sirius>, good work.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: If possible, I would have liked to stay in front until the end but, the result was 6th place.
Yeah but you still looked like you were enjoying yourself out there. Even now, [I had fun] is written all over your face.
Yeah but you still looked like you were enjoying yourself out there. Even now, [I had fun] is written all over your face.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Even though it should be more difficult to win like this, the "scenery" that spreads before my eyes is very beautiful…
You'll definitely be able to see even more beautiful "scenery" from now on. Since your feelings are overflowing to this extent.
And I'm really excited too. That I get to continue watching over you as you reach out to take hold of that "scenery".
And I'm really excited too. That I get to continue watching over you as you reach out to take hold of that "scenery".

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: As I reach out and take hold of that "scenery"…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: So that's the "scenery" that Trainer-san wants so see, right?
Yeah, I can hardly picture it clearly right now though-
Yeah, I can hardly picture it clearly right now though-
I get the feeling… it'll be an amazing "scenery".
To that end, I'll also support Suzuka to the fullest.
To that end, I'll also support Suzuka to the fullest.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu… understood.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Definitely, I'll show Trainer-san the "scenery" you want to see.
